text: 1000 (1,000, one thousand or thousand for short) is the natural number after 999 and before 1001. One thousand thousands is known as a million. In Roman Numerals, 1000 is written as M. ==Examples== * The number of years in a millennium * The number of grams in a kilogram * The number of millimeters in a meter 1000
title: 1000 (number)
